Demographic

Suggested Data Resources

[styled_table]

Product Name Type Steward(s) Description
click a product name for more information and download links
2010 Demographic Data map data AGRC and the U.S. Census Bureau. 2010 data from the Census Bureau including census blocks, census block groups, census tracts, and census counties.
Also included are files created by AGRC containing population for incorporated and unincorporated areas in Utah.
2000 Demographic Data map data AGRC and the U.S. Census Bureau. 2000 data from the Census Bureau including census blocks, census block groups, census tracts, census counties, MetroMicro statistical areas, and town demographics.

[/styled_table]
